New Records: Glenn Maxwell equaled Rohit Sharma's record for the most T20I hundreds with 5 centuries in the format
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 120 not out from 55 balls against West Indies in Adelaide, helping Australia set up their highest T20I score on home soil of 241 for 4
Pre-Game Insights: Glenn Maxwell expressed his confidence in his batting and game, feeling clear and comfortable in the T20I format
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell admitted to getting frustrated early in his innings but calmed down to hit some extraordinary shots, including a switch hit
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell's score of 120 was the second-highest by a batter coming in at No.4 or below in T20Is, and four of his five T20I centuries have come at No.4
Others: Glenn Maxwell enjoys batting at No.4 due to its challenging nature and the opportunity to change the momentum of the game
